text: Zai ni [mu sheng] zhiqian, wo que yi paiqianguo xuduo shizhe, tamen zhong youxie [de gushi] wo yi gaosu ni, youxie wo shangwei gaosu ni. Chufei jing an la xuke, fouze, renhe shizhe dou buneng xianshi jixiang. Dang an la de mingling lailin shi, wanshi dou jiang bei binggong panjue. Na shi, zhuisui miuwu zhe que yi sunshi.
